items.name: Raj
items.message: Hey, have you seen Sachin's records? I mean, it's unbelievable how he managed to score over 34,000 runs in international cricket!

items.name: Amit
items.message: I know, right? And he has over 100 international centuries! That's something no one seems to come close to.

items.name: Raj
items.message: Absolutely! And the way he played under pressure was just incredible. Remember that inning against Australia in the World Cup? It was legendary!

items.name: Amit
items.message: Yeah, that inning was something else! It's moments like those that make cricket so exciting. I guess we'll always admire Sachin for his amazing contributions to the game. Let's catch a match together sometime soon!

config.prompt: Two friends talking about cricket, and Sachin Tendulkar's records
